welcome_message_body: Welcome to Antioch, where small town charm meets big city amenities! Known for its picturesque marina and rich history, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sacramento Mather Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sacramento Mather Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Executive Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buchanan Field Airport serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Livermore Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, offering a range of services and amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Terminal Airport is the primary hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Air Terminal Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.
